metadata.title: CVE-2022-3060 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper control of a resource identifier in Error Tracking in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions from 12.7 allows an authenticated attacker togenerate content which could cause a victim to make unintended arbitraryrequests

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
